EmailTemplate.description: Final Notification before deactivation, DEPRECATED US-0010516
EmailTemplate.name: Final Notification2
EmailTemplate.subject: Final Notification before deactivation
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Final Notification Dear {!User.FirstName},
This is a final notification before your access to Hive is deactivated in a week if no action is taken.
Please click on the following link to login to Hive: https://hive.lightning.force.com
Kind regards
The Project Hive Team
